channel.title: Ilya Pantsyr's Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Ilya Pantsyr's Blog

item.title: About
item.description: My name is Ilya Pantsyr and I spend most of my time in front of the computer. I study at Chernivtsi National University (ChNU) in Ukraine, majoring in Software Engineering (2021-2025). For many years I’ve been exploring and learning something new about the endless world of programming and computers. At the moment, I do not work anywhere and do not have commercial experience, so I improving my skills on pet projects and looking forward to my first offer.

item.title: Projects
item.description: Datafaker An actively contributing to this project. This library is a modern port of java-faker (also contributed to java-faker in past), built on Java 8, with up to date libraries and several newly added Fake Generators. Let’s PDF An Image(s) to PDF conversion service that allows you immediately convert .img to .pdf. JDepChisel An Java Dependency Visualizer. Works by scanning .class files and parsing it. TGCryptoBot A Telegram Bot that shows cryptocurrency prices.
